pages.about: About Saffron Oasis | Our Journey, Values, and Commitment to Excellence Contact About us Casino About Saffron Oasis | Our Journey, Values, and Commitment to Excellence Our Story: Saffron Oasis began as a dream in 1985 when our founder, Rajesh Patel, envisioned a haven of luxury and tranquility in the bustling heart of India. Starting with a small guesthouse in Mumbai, Rajesh's unwavering commitment to exceptional service and attention to detail quickly earned a loyal following among travelers. As word spread of the unparalleled hospitality at our modest establishment, we gradually expanded our offerings. In 1995, we opened our first full-service hotel in Jaipur, marking the birth of the Saffron Oasis brand. Our unique blend of traditional Indian warmth and modern luxury resonated with guests from around the world. Over the years, we've grown from a single property to a collection of award-winning hotels across India. Each step of our journey has been guided by our passion for creating memorable experiences for our guests. We've continuously innovated, introducing new services and amenities while never losing sight of our core values. Our success in the hotel industry is a testament to our dedicated team, many of whom have been with us for decades. Their expertise, combined with our commitment to personalized service, has allowed us to consistently exceed guest expectations. At Saffron Oasis, we believe that our guests are the heart of our business. We cherish every visitor, whether they're staying for a night or a fortnight. Our team goes above and beyond to ensure that each guest feels valued, understood, and cared for during their stay. We're constantly evolving, seeking new ways to enhance our offerings and elevate the guest experience. From implementing the latest technologies to sourcing the finest local ingredients for our restaurants, we're always striving to be better. Our commitment to sustainability and community engagement also drives us to make positive impacts beyond our hotel walls. Experience Luxury Like Never Before Immerse yourself in the Saffron Oasis experience and discover why we're India's premier luxury hotel. From our exquisitely appointed rooms to our world-class amenities, every aspect of your stay is designed to delight and inspire. Book Your Retreat Now Our Core Principles: Exceptional Service: We believe that true luxury lies in the quality of service. Our staff is trained to anticipate and exceed guest expectations at every turn. Cultural Authenticity: We celebrate India's rich heritage by infusing local culture into every aspect of our hotels, from architecture to cuisine. Continuous Innovation: We constantly seek new ways to enhance our offerings and stay ahead of industry trends. Sustainability: We are committed to minimizing our environmental impact and supporting local communities through responsible business practices. Personalization: We recognize that each guest is unique, and we tailor our services to meet individual preferences and needs. Attention to Detail: We believe that perfection lies in the details, and we ensure that every element of our hotels meets the highest standards. Employee Empowerment: We invest in our team's growth and well-being, believing that happy employees create happy guests. At Saffron Oasis, these principles guide every decision we make and every interaction we have. They are the foundation of our success and the reason why guests choose us time and time again. pages.privacy-policy: Privacy Policy | Saffron Oasis Hotel Contact About us Casino Saffron Oasis Hotel Privacy Policy Privacy Policy At Saffron Oasis, we are committed to protecting your privacy and ensuring the security of your personal information. This Privacy Policy outlines how we collect, use, disclose, and safeguard your data when you visit our website, use our services, or interact with us in any way. Information We Collect We collect personal information that you provide to us voluntarily, such as your name, email address, phone number, and booking details when you make a reservation or sign up for our newsletter. We may also automatically collect certain information about your device and browsing behavior when you visit our website, including your IP address, browser type, and pages visited. How We Use Your Information We use the information we collect to provide and improve our services, process your reservations, communicate with you about your bookings and our offerings, and personalize your experience. We may also use your data for marketing purposes, but only with your explicit consent. Data Protection We implement a variety of security measures to maintain the safety of your personal information. Your data is stored on secure servers and is only accessible to authorized personnel who require it to perform their duties. Third-Party Disclosure We do not sell, trade, or otherwise transfer your personally identifiable information to outside parties. This does not include trusted third parties who assist us in operating our website, conducting our business, or servicing you, as long as those parties agree to keep this information confidential. Cookies We use cookies to enhance your browsing experience and analyze website traffic. You can choose to disable cookies through your browser settings, but this may affect your ability to use certain features of our website. Your Rights You have the right to access, correct, or delete your personal information at any time. You may also withdraw your consent for us to use your data for marketing purposes. To exercise these rights, please contact us at saffronoasis@gmail.com. Changes to This Policy We may update this Privacy Policy from time to time to reflect changes in our practices or for other operational, legal, or regulatory reasons. We encourage you to review this policy periodically to stay informed about how we protect your information. Contact Us If you have any questions or concerns about our Privacy Policy, please don't hesitate to contact us at saffronoasis@gmail.com. By using our website and services, you consent to the terms of this Privacy Policy. We appreciate your trust in us and are committed to protecting your privacy and ensuring a secure and enjoyable experience at Saffron Oasis. Disclaimer Terms conditions Privacy policy Phone: +9134255634425 E-mail: saffronoasis@gmail.com Contact About us Casino © 2024 Saffron Oasis Hotel
pages.terms-conditions: Terms and Conditions | Saffron Oasis Hotel and Casino Contact About us Casino Terms and Conditions | Saffron Oasis Hotel and Casino Terms and Conditions Welcome to Saffron Oasis. By accessing or using our website, booking our services, or visiting our premises, you agree to comply with and be bound by the following terms and conditions: 1. Booking and Reservations 1.1. All bookings are subject to availability and confirmation by Saffron Oasis. 1.2. A valid credit card is required to secure your reservation. 1.3. Rates are per room per night and are subject to change without notice. 2. Check-in and Check-out 2.1. Check-in time is 3:00 PM, and check-out time is 12:00 PM. 2.2. Early check-in and late check-out may be available upon request and may incur additional charges. 3. Cancellation Policy 3.1. Cancellations made 48 hours prior to the check-in date will receive a full refund. 3.2. Cancellations made within 48 hours of the check-in date will be charged one night's stay. 3.3. No-shows will be charged the full amount of the reservation. 4. Casino Rules 4.1. Guests must be 18 years or older to enter the casino area. 4.2. Saffron Oasis reserves the right to refuse entry to the casino at its discretion. 4.3. Photography and video recording are strictly prohibited in the casino area. 5. Liability 5.1. Saffron Oasis is not responsible for any loss, damage, or theft of personal belongings on the premises. 5.2. Guests are liable for any damage caused to hotel property during their stay. 6. Privacy Policy 6.1. We respect your privacy and protect your personal information in accordance with applicable laws. 6.2. By providing your information, you consent to its collection and use as described in our Privacy Policy. 7. Modifications to Services 7.1. Saffron Oasis reserves the right to modify or discontinue any service or amenity without prior notice. 8. Governing Law 8.1. These terms and conditions are governed by and construed in accordance with the laws of India. 9. Complaints and Disputes 9.1. Any complaints or disputes should be directed to our customer service team at saffronoasis@gmail.com. 10. Amendments 10.1. Saffron Oasis reserves the right to amend these terms and conditions at any time without prior notice. 10.2. The most current version will always be available on our website. 11. Acceptance of Terms 11.1. By using our services, you acknowledge that you have read, understood, and agree to be bound by these terms and conditions. If you have any questions regarding these terms and conditions, please contact us at saffronoasis@gmail.com.
